description:
It`s another thirteen-episodes-in-one special!  The Keroro Platoon tries to think of lots of strange invasion ideas, Giroro mistakes a "bath" for a "battle," and there`s a special live action segment of the platoon!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro Special Returns! Gero Gero 30 Minutes, 13 Stories
帰ってきたゲロゲロ30分
